title: Sleep-Gut Microbiome Analysis
description: Explored the relationship between sleep quality, psychological disorders, and the gut microbiome using QIIME, RPCA, Qurro, and random forest models. Built pipelines with Birdman and Qadabra for robust ML analysis.

title: Recipe Time Estimation
description: Performed hypothesis testing and built a decision tree model to predict recipe cooking time. Focused on model interpretability and fairness metrics.

title: Blue Dot Project
description: Summarized neurobiological models of rumination and LC-NE system. Conducted EDA and analyzed Neuro Turing machine outputs.

title: Simpsons PCA Face Reconstruction
description: Applied PCA for feature extraction and image reconstruction using The Simpsons dataset. Presented results via slides and an edited video.

title: HCI Survey & AI Research
description: Designed surveys on AI trust and performance. Applied ML models and reinforcement learning frameworks for behavioral prediction.

title: Accent Recognition
description: Designed an efficient tensor conversion pipeline, optimizing data preprocessing to improve model performance and reduce latency. Developed and presented a project on Accent Recognition using Wav2Vec2, focusing on converting datasets into tensors for model training.

title: Language differentiation
description: Built a Naive Bayes text classification model from scratch(using only Numpy and Pandas without external packages or libraries) to distinguish Spanish and French words. Did feature engineering on bigram and word-ending features, constructed a vocabulary based, vectorized words and computed log-probabilities for the robust predict.Achieved a 83% test accuracy.

title: Amusing
description: Tried to decode data from a BCI device Muse and organize project meetings with 4 peers weekly
